name: 葛瑞斐
objective:
通過簡短的寫作作業和課堂討論，本課程將幫助培養學生的英語寫作技巧和作文策略。 除了注意修改和提高清晰度的文體策略之外，我們還將專注於研究論文所需的準備和計劃——關於可能導致可行的高級寫作項目的問題和論點的種類。

Through short writing assignments and class discussion, this course will help develop students’ English writing skills and strategies for composition.  In addition to noting stylistic strategies for revision and improved clarity, we will focus on the preparation and planning needed for a research paper – on the kinds of questions and arguments which could potentially lead to a viable Senior Writing Project.
